text: Louis Joachim Marie François Giscard d'Estaing (born 20 October 1958) is a French politician. He was a member of the National Assembly of France. He is the son of the late President of France Valéry Giscard d'Estaing (1926-2020) and Anne-Aymone Giscard d'Estaing (née Sauvage de Brantes).Laure Dumont, La confrérie des Giscard d'Estaing, L'Expansion, 01/02/2003 He is mayor of Chamalières since 2005. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Paris Category:Valéry Giscard d'Estaing
title: Louis Giscard d'Estaing
